content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>City and County of Denver - Public Works City Surveyor's Office</origin>         <pubdate>20120808</pubdate>         <title>Benchmarks</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>This dataset contains vertical benchmark data for the City and County of Denver. Monumentation for this dataset includes U.S. Coast and Geodetic Survey (USCGS), National Geodetic Survey (NGS), and City and County of Denver (CCD) benchmarks. Elevations for bench marks are typically determined by standard differential leveling activity. NGS High-Accuracy Reference Network (HARN) points are portrayed in the ENG_SRVNGSHARN_P dataset.</abstract>       <purpose>The purpose of this dataset is to allow users to integrate City and County of Denver (CCD) vertical network data into engineering plans, proposed projects, etc.</purpose>     </descript>     <status>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.109367</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.667902</eastbc>         <northbc>39.800205</northbc>         <southbc>39.608125</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>survey</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>elevation</themekey>         <themekey>location</themekey>         <themekey>planningCadastre</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:  None.  USE CONSTRAINTS:  The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.   NOT FOR ENGINEERING PURPOSES </useconst>     <datacred>Public Works - City Surveyor's Office</datacred>     <secinfo>       <secsys>AVAILABLE</secsys>       <secclass>Unclassified</secclass>       <sechandl>Available to the general public and accessible through the Denver\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Open Data Catalog, http://data.denvergov.org/  </sechandl>     </secinfo>     <native>Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.5.4400</native>   </idinfo>   <dataqual />   <spdoinfo>     <direct>Vector</direct>     <ptvctinf>       <sdtsterm>         <sdtstype>Entity point</sdtstype>         <ptvctcnt>770</ptvctcnt>       </sdtsterm>     </ptvctinf>   </spdoinfo>   <spref>     <horizsys>       <geograph>         <latres>8.9831528411952133e-009</latres>         <longres>8.9831528411952133e-009</longres>         <geogunit>Decimal Degrees</geogunit>       </geograph>       <geodetic>         <horizdn>D WGS 1984</horizdn>         <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips>         <semiaxis>6378137.0</semiaxis>         <denflat>298.257223563</denflat>       </geodetic>     </horizsys>   </spref>   <eainfo>     <detailed>       <enttyp>         <enttypl>benchmarks</enttypl>       </enttyp>       <attr>         <attrlabl>OBJECTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Internal feature number.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Feature geometry.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Coordinates defining the features.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CCDPTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>An internal index number for all City/County survey control points.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver Surveyor's Office.</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COMMONNAME</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The name by which the Bench Mark is commonly referred.  For CCD benchmarks, this is typically a 1-3 digit number.  If followed by an alpha character, this indicates that the original benchmark was lost.  Each succeeding monument is assigned the next alpha character.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CCDCORNERTYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>An internal classifier used to separate different classes of survey markers in the GIS Parcel Fabric.  For this layer, CCDCORNERTYPE will be "Bench Mark".</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MONUMENTTYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The basic physical appearance of the monument as it appears in the field.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MONUMENTSOURCE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The organization responsible for having set the monument in the field.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MONUMENTSIZE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The physical size of the monument, especially if it is a standard round survey disc or a rebar.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SURVEYORLICENSENUMBER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the Colorado Professional Land Surveyor license number of the surveyor responsible placing the monument in the field.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>MONUMENTPROTECTION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Any material or device used to protect a monument from damage or disturbance, such as a concrete pad or cast iron range box.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SURVEYDATEGPS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the date that the monument was measured using Global Positioning System technology.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SURVEYDATENAV88</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the date that elevation was established for the monument by differential leveling.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NAVD88SOURCE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the organization responsible for establishing the elevation of the monument by differential leveling.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GPSSOURCE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the organization responsible for establishing the GPS location of the monument.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>STATEPLANECOORDINATEX</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Colorado State Plane Central Zone NAD83/92 easting in feet.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>STATEPLANECOORDINATEY</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Colorado State Plane Central Zone NAD83/92 northing in feet.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CCD_LOCALX</attrlabl>         <attrdef>CCD Local coordinate system easting in feet.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CCD_LOCALY</attrlabl>         <attrdef>CCD Local coordinate system northing in feet.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NAV88ELEVATION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Elevation of the benchmark in United States Survey Feet, North American Vertical Datum of 1988.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CORNERPOINTTYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>This field is used primarily to distinguish between the several types of PLSS corner types.  Otherwise, it is a general classification based on pre-Parcel Fabric datasets.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ALTERNATENAME</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Other names by which the bench mark may be called other than the Common Name.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GPSID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>CCD GPS Point Identifier. Additional information about GPS locations can be found at O:\\PWENG\\SURVEY\\GPS\\DATA\\CCDGPSAL.XLS. If the value is zero, this point has not been officially GPS'd by CCD personnel.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COORDINATEMETHOD</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The method by which the monument's GIS XY coordinate location was derived.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>EASTWESTSTREET</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Closest East /West avenue.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NORTHSOUTHSTREET</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Closest North/South street.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>STREETADDRESS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>If available, the nearest street address.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>DESCRIPTION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Description of the monument, including: Responsible Party, Monument Type and Size, and Proximity to Nearby Witness Features.  A carryover field from pre-Parcel Fabric datasets.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>COMMENTS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A primary column for comments regarding the data record.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>NOTES</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A secondary column for comments regarding the data record.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GLOBALID</attrlabl>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ELLIPSOIDHEIGHT</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Ellipsoid height derived from GPS observation of the monument.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>     </detailed>   </eainfo>   <distinfo>     <distrib>       <cntinfo>         <cntorgp>           <cntorg>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / DenverGIS Data </cntorg>         </cntorgp>         <cntaddr>           <addrtype>unknown</addrtype>           <address>201 W Colfax Ave, Dept 301</address>           <city>Denver</city>           <state>CO</state>           <postal>80202</postal>           <country>USA</country>         </cntaddr>         <cntfax>720-913-5237</cntfax>         <cntemail>denvergis@denvergov.org</cntemail>         <hours>M-F 8:00am - 4:00pm (MT)</hours>       </cntinfo>     </distrib>     <distliab>See access and use constraints information.</distliab>   </distinfo>   <metainfo>     <metd>20150315</metd>     <metstdn>FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn>     <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv>     <mettc>local time</mettc>   </metainfo> </metadata>
